Title: Criminalizes knowingly causing a minor to attend a place where exhibition of animal fighting is being conducted
Summary: Criminalizes knowingly causing a minor to attend a place where exhibition of animal fighting is being conducted, such is considered a misdemeanor.
LawCode: Amd ยง351, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the prohibition of animal fighting
